titleInfo.title: 'File 6/33 Saqr, Jabar, Rizq and Abdullah bin Abdur Rahman bin Abdul Wahab bin Salman Al Khalifah - Claim allowances from the State'

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 23; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 3-19; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence relating to claims for financial support from the Government of Bahrain made by distant relatives of the ruler, Shaikh Hamad bin Isa al-Khalifah [Shaikh Ḥamad bin ‘Īsá Āl Khalīfah]. The correspondence is between the Political Agent, Bahrain, Adviser to the Government of Bahrain (Charles Dalrymple Belgrave), Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, and the claimants themselves.The papers cover the discussion following a petition to the Political Agent from the claimants. The matter is left with Shaikh Hamad with no clearly evident outcome.Folios 20-21 are internal office notes.
